linkout	{{ settings.SITE_NAME }}	{{ paper.id }}			
title	{{ paper.title }}
{% for author in paper.authors.all() %}author	{{ author.lastname}}, {{ author.firstname }}
{% endfor %}{% if paper.paper_type == "Degree Thesis" %}type	MTHES
year	{{ paper.year }}
{% else %}{% if paper.paper_type == "Preprint" or paper.paper_type = "Submitted" %}type	ELEC
journal {{ settings.SITE_NAME }} preprint server {{ settings.SERVER_URL }}/paper/{{ paper.id }}/
year	{{ paper.year }}
start_page {{ paper.first_page }}
end_page {{ paper.end_page }}
{% else %}type	JOUR
journal	{{ paper.journal }}
volume	{{ paper.volume }}
issue	{{ paper.number }}
year	{{ paper.year }}
start_page	{{ paper.first_page }}
end_page	{{ paper.last_page }}
{% endif %}{% endif %}end_tsv
